statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, ethnicity FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT patient_name, ethnicity FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, ethnicity FROM patients WHERE age > 40 AND gender='Female' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT age, gender FROM patients WHERE ethnicity='Asian' ORDER BY age, gender;
SELECT patient_name, age, preventive_care_services_updated FROM patients WHERE age >= 60 ORDER BY preventive_care_services_updated DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT service_name, service_cost FROM preventive_care_services;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_cost FROM preventive_care_services WHERE demographic_factor = 'Children';
SELECT provider_name, city, state FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT provider_name, city, state FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM preventive_care_services WHERE service_cost > 1000;
SELECT provider_name, service_name, service_description FROM healthcare_providers JOIN preventive_care_services ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = preventive_care_services.provider_id;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_type FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, address FROM healthcare_providers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, city FROM providers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, service_provided FROM appointments WHERE provider_id='abc123';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND service_provided IN ('Consultation', 'Check-up') AND provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND ethnicity = 'Hispanic' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, address, city, state FROM providers WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, appointments.appointment_date, patients.first_name AS patient_first_name, providers.provider_name AS provider_name FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN providers ON appointments.provider_id = providers.provider_id ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM providers WHERE location LIKE '%Clinic%';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT service_name, cost, duration FROM services ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, ethnicity FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM providers ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT service_name, cost, duration FROM services WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY duration DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.provider_name, s.service_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id INNER JOIN providers pr ON a.provider_id = pr.provider_id INNER JOIN services s ON a.service_id = s.service_id WHERE a.status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM Providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT provider_name, provider_id FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM Providers;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT appointment_type, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM Services WHERE service_name LIKE '%consultation%' ORDER BY service_name ASC;

SELECT d.patient_id, d.demographic_factor, d.demographic_value, p.patient_name FROM Demographics d JOIN Patients p ON d.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE d.demographic_factor = 'income' AND d.demographic_value > '50000';
